scripts.name: Instagram Sample Bot (Adaptive Scroll, Sample & Like)
scripts.description: Automates Instagram scrolling: fluid in foreground, jumpy in background. Detects and filters sample offers by popular beauty brands, and auto-likes relevant posts. Includes customizable settings and improved UI. Now with in-app Help and Update options in settings, improved modal visibility, fluid UI panel animations, intelligent loading detection, and draggable UI confined to viewport.
